Class BaseModule

The base for Pac-Man Bot modules, including their main services and some utilities.

Syntax
[PmRequireBotPermission(ChannelPermission.AddReactions | ChannelPermission.EmbedLinks | ChannelPermission.ReadMessageHistory | ChannelPermission.UseExternalEmojis)]
public abstract class BaseModule : ModuleBase<PmCommandContext>, IModuleBase

GetResponseAsync(Func<SocketUserMessage, Boolean>, Int32)

Returns the first new message from the user in this context that satisfies additional conditions. The value will be null if no valid response is received within the timeout in seconds.
